Candidate: User can now choose to view the Candidate Detail/Edit page in horizontal or vertical layout.
Page actions such as Download CV, Save is now located at the upper right portion of the page.
DOB, License Dates are now using MM-YYYY format.
New ability to add multiple online platform ID/url. such as zoom, etc...
Fixed bug when downloading CV using Medical template
Years of experience is now general data. Previously only under medical candidates.
Suppliers Module: Person of Contact field 'Notes' renamed to 'Position'
